MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL30 postcode area of Penryhn Bay affecting a number of properties in the local area. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because our engineers are investigating a suspected second fault on the network. Our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:00pm on 30th April 2021.
